p: We used real-time reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) to test human NP/OP samples for influenza A virus RNA by applying primers and probes against the matrix gene of influenza A and NS1 gene of influenza B viruses [ 11]. A cycle threshold (C T) value of ≤ 40 was the cut-off for positivity. Positive and negative controls were used to validate test assay.
